isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 5 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS SPICER ES65-5 - REASSEMBLY - MAINSHAFT

step1.para: Lubricate the caged needle bearings with light grease and install in 1st speed gear ( Figure 47). Assemble to mainshaft with clutch teeth down (toward the rear of the mainshaft).

figure.caption: Figure 47. Install Caged Needle Bearings in 1st Speed Gear

step1.para: Lubricate thrust washer and assemble on mainshaft ( Figure 48). Firmly seat 1st speed gear snap ring in groove on mainshaft. To avoid distortion, do not expand snap ring excessively.

figure.caption: Figure 48. Assemble Thrust Washer on Mainshaft

step1.para: Install the 2nd speed gear on mainshaft with clutch teeth up (toward front of mainshaft) ( Figure 49). Assemble 2nd-3rd speed clutch gear on splines of mainshaft.

figure.caption: Figure 49. Install 2nd Speed Gear on Mainshaft

step1.para: Assemble 2nd-3rd speed synchronizer on mainshaft with LONG hub DOWN (toward 2nd speed gear) ( Figure 50).

figure.caption: Figure 50. Assemble 2nd-3rd Speed Synchronizer on Mainshaft

step1.para: Install 2nd-3rd speed clutch gear snap ring ( Figure 51).

figure.caption: Figure 51. Install 2nd-3rd Speed Clutch Gear Snap Ring

step1.para: Assemble 3rd speed gear on mainshaft with clutch teeth down (toward rear of mainshaft) ( Figure 52). Align pin in bore of 4th speed gear sleeve with spline of mainshaft, and place on mainshaft with flange facing 3rd speed gear (down).

figure.caption: Figure 52. Assemble 3rd Speed Gear on Mainshaft

step1.para: Press or drive 4th speed gear sleeve into position with a suitable tool ( Figure 53).

figure.caption: Figure 53. Press 4th Speed Gear Sleeve into Position

step1.para: Slide 4th gear with hub up (toward front of mainshaft) over 4th speed gear sleeve ( Figure 54). Lubricate thrust washer and install under bore of 4th speed gear. Firmly seat 4th speed gear snap ring in groove on mainshaft.

figure.caption: Figure 54. Slide 4th Gear over 4th Speed Gear Sleeve

step1.para: Assemble 4th-5th speed synchronizer to mainshaft with larger brass ring DOWN (toward 4th speed gear) ( Figure 55).

figure.caption: Figure 55. Assemble 4th-5th Speed Synchronizer to Mainshaft

step1.para: Press drive gear pocket onto pilot of mainshaft ( Figure 56).

figure.caption: Figure 56. Press Drive Gear Pocket onto Pilot of Mainshaft

step1.para: Slide 1st-reverse clutch collar onto mainshaft (it's symmetrical) ( Figure 57). Lubricate caged bearings with light grease and install in bore of reverse gear. Assemble reverse gear on mainshaft, with clutch teeth toward 1st speed gear.

figure.caption: Figure 57. Slide 1st-Reverse Clutch Collar onto Mainshaft

step1.para: Lubricate reverse gear thrust washer and assemble on mainshaft ( Figure 58).

figure.caption: Figure 58. Assemble Reverse Gear Thrust Washer on Mainshaft

step1.para: Press the bearing on the rear of the mainshaft ( Figure 59).

figure.caption: Figure 59. Press Bearing on Rear of Mainshaft
